SapListener

SapSender
SendersEndpointSAP
Implementation of sender that calls a SAP RFC-function. N.B. If no requestFieldIndex or requestFieldName is specified, input is converted from xml; If no replyFieldIndex or replyFieldName is specified, output is converted to xml.
See also
Github - SapSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.sap.SapSender
Syntax
Copy
<SapSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
synchronous	boolean	true
Hack to allow to introduce a correlationid
SapSenderImpl
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
synchronous	boolean	false
If false, the sender operates in RR mode: the a reply is expected from SAP, and the sender does not participate in a transaction. When false, the sender operates in FF mode: no reply is expected from SAP, and the sender
